articles.title: Boy Scout rescued from Mount Washington after allergic reaction
articles.description:
The teen experienced a “significant” allergic reaction after climbing to the summit Sunday afternoon, according to officials.

The post Boy Scout rescued from Mount Washington after allergic reaction appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Teen Boy Scout rescued from Mount Washington after severe allergic reaction on Sunday.
Rescue officials reported the incident occurred at the summit during a climbing trip.
Local emergency services emphasize the importance of carrying allergy medications while hiking.

articles.title: New owner steps in at Grumpy’s
articles.description:
Thomas Holmes, 28, says that he'll keep the beloved Route 6A breakfast spot as it is: “Absolutely nothing will change.”

The post New owner steps in at Grumpy’s appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Thomas Holmes, 28, is the new owner of Grumpy's breakfast spot.
Holmes promises no changes to the beloved Route 6A restaurant.
Boston residents can continue enjoying Grumpy's as a local favorite.

articles.title: Local obituary: John Rousanidis, Peabody 33-year-old and crewmember on Lily Jean
articles.description:
"In 2016, John moved back to Peabody to chase his dreams."

The post Local obituary: John Rousanidis, Peabody 33-year-old and crewmember on Lily Jean appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: John Rousanidis, 33, passed away, leaving a mark on Peabody community.
He returned to Peabody in 2016 to pursue his dreams.
His role as a crewmember on Lily Jean impacted local maritime culture.

articles.title: What experts are saying about a possible Patriots trade for Maxx Crosby
articles.description:
"Now is the time to make a splash move, and dealing for Crosby would qualify."

The post What experts are saying about a possible Patriots trade for Maxx Crosby appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Experts suggest the Patriots should trade for Maxx Crosby to enhance their defense.
Crosby, a standout defensive end, recorded 8 sacks in the 2022 season.
A trade could significantly improve the Patriots' chances in the upcoming season.

articles.title: Local obituary: Sgt. Freeman Short, 31-year-old Marshfield native and Lily Jean crewmember
articles.description:
"Though his body was never recovered, Freeman’s life, spirit, and memory remain deeply present with all who knew and loved him."

The post Local obituary: Sgt. Freeman Short, 31-year-old Marshfield native and Lily Jean crewmember appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Sgt. Freeman Short, 31, from Marshfield, served on the Lily Jean.
His body was never recovered, leaving a lasting impact on the community.
Residents remember Freeman's spirit and contributions to local life.

articles.title: Police seek suspect in $15K purse theft
articles.description:
Authorities released photos of a man and a vehicle connected to a theft at Sweet Jane’s Designer Consignment.

The post Police seek suspect in $15K purse theft appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Police are investigating a $15,000 purse theft at Sweet Jane’s Designer Consignment.
Authorities released images of a suspect and vehicle involved in the theft.
Residents should remain vigilant as police seek information on the suspect.

articles.title: Push for more housing in Union Square hinges on zoning change
articles.description:
The Hamilton Company filed a proposed zoning amendment on Tuesday to make way for a 180-unit development.

The post Push for more housing in Union Square hinges on zoning change appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Hamilton Company proposed a zoning amendment for Union Square on February 17.
The amendment aims to facilitate a 180-unit housing development.
Approval could significantly increase housing availability in Union Square for Boston residents.
